# environment

**Type Property**

The value is an `NSDictionary`, mapping `NSStrings` to `NSStrings`, containing environment variables to set for the new app.  Ignored if a new instance of the app is not launched. This constant is not available to sandboxed apps.

## Declaration

```swift
static let environment: NSWorkspace.LaunchConfigurationKey
```

## Type Properties

- **appleEvent**: The value is the first NSAppleEventDescriptor to send to the new app.  If an instance of the app is already running, this is sent to that app.
- **architecture**: The value is an NSNumber containing an Mach-O Architecture constant.  Ignored if a new instance of the app is not launched.
- **arguments**: The value is an `NSArray` of `NSStrings`, passed to the new app in the `argv` parameter.  Ignored if a new instance of the app is not launched. This constant is not available to sandboxed apps.
